title: Women detail drug use, sex and payments after late-night parties with Gaetz and others
description: The first thing some of the women were asked to do when they got to the house parties in the gated community in suburban Orlando was to put away their cellphones, according to two women in attendance who spoke to CNN in recent days. The men inside, a who's who of local Republican officials that often included Rep. Matt Gaetz, did not want the night's activities documented.

title: Biden's Afghanistan withdrawal decision went against advisers' advice
US Capitol rioter who tried to flee to Switzerland is jailed pre-trial
description: A geophysicist who allegedly beat police officers who were trying to help injured rioters during the US Capitol siege will be jailed before trial, a federal judge ruled Wednesday, citing the man's ham-handed attempt to flee to Switzerland as proof that he poses a literal flight risk.

title: US President ordered the withdrawal from Afghanistan over the advice of some of his most senior advisers in the Pentagon and State Department
description: President Joe Biden ordered the withdrawal of US forces from Afghanistan over the advice of some of his senior-most advisers in the Pentagon and State Department, leaders who are now charged with carrying out the particulars of the complicated drawdown.

title: Scientists translated spider webs into music. It could help us talk to them
description: Scientists at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology have turned spider webs into music -- creating an eerie soundtrack that could help them better understand how the arachnids spin their complex creations and even how they communicate.

title: Scientists turned spiderwebs into music and it sounds like a nightmare
description: MIT researchers scanned intricate spiderwebs with a laser and turned them into music. It sounds just as creepy as you might think.

title: A state trooper shot and killed a 16-year-old armed with a knife and airsoft gun, Maryland authorities say
description: A 16-year-old, armed with a knife and what turned out to be an airsoft gun, was shot and killed Tuesday afternoon by a Maryland state trooper, a state police official said.

title: Biden: It's time to end America's longest war
description: It's an image President Joe Biden kept returning to: the sight of helicopters evacuating Americans from Saigon during the last major battle of the Vietnam War.

title: A number on Covid-19 vaccinations that will leave you shaking your head
Analysis: Why US is leaving Afghanistan, what happens next
description: President Joe Biden's promise to remove US troops from Afghanistan by September 11 is his effort -- each of the last four presidents has had one -- to end America's longest war.

title: Why Biden made the announcement in this particular room
description: CNN's Kaitlan Collins explains why President Biden's decision to announce the withdrawal of US troops in Afghanistan from the White House Treaty Room may have been intentional.

title: Former 'Bachelor' star Colton Underwood: 'I'm gay'
description: Colton Underwood told Robin Roberts on "Good Morning America" that he is gay in an interview that aired Wednesday morning.

title: Ex-officer charged in killing of Daunte Wright
Judges are split on how seriously to take John Roberts' abortion opinion
description: Almost a year after Chief Justice John Roberts sided with the Supreme Court's liberals to cast the determinative vote to block a Louisiana abortion law, his opinion in the case is causing deep divisions among lower court judges and lawyers.

title: Parts of US 'backsliding into the days of Jim Crow', Biden says
description: President Joe Biden said Wednesday that parts of the United States are "backsliding into the days of Jim Crow" by passing laws he says are reminiscent of when Black Americans had to pay poll taxes and pass other tests before casting their vote.

title: Soccer player gets 10-game ban for racist behavior
description: Slavia Prague defender Ondřej Kúdela has been banned for 10 matches by UEFA after the governing body's investigation into allegations of the player's "racist behavior" towards Rangers' midfielder Glen Kamara during the sides' UEFA Europa League meeting at Ibrox stadium last month.

title: The Queen returns to royal duties following Prince Philip's death
Dogecoin price surpasses 10 cents to reach an all-time high
description: Bitcoin and Ethereum aren't the only digital currencies that are hitting record highs this week. Dogecoin, the crypocurrency that features the face of a Shiba Inu dog as its logo, has surpassed 10 cents for the first time.

title: Donald Trump is building a shadow Republican Party
description: On Monday, a cohort of former Trump administration officials launched the America First Policy Institute, a think tank organization aimed at promoting "liberty, free enterprise, national greatness, American military superiority, foreign-policy engagement in the American interest, and the primacy of American workers," according to its website.

title: HSBC is moving the heart of the bank back to Hong Kong
description: HSBC will move four of its most senior executives to Hong Kong later this year, as the London-based bank focuses more attention on fast-growing markets in Asia.

title: Mehdi Taremi nets extraordinary Champions League goal to become first Iranian scorer in the quarterfinals
description: Mehdi Taremi scored a truly spectacular overhead kick on Tuesday to become the first Iranian player to score in the Champions League quarterfinals.

title: Bernie Madoff, infamous Ponzi schemer, has died
Instagram is testing a feature that lets users choose if they want to see likes
description: Instagram is testing a feature that would let users decide if they want to hide likes on their own posts or posts from people they follow.

title: 'I felt like I was dying,' a mom says after watching her sons hold hands and cross the border alone
description: The mother's mind raced as she watched her sons from the Mexican side of the Rio Grande.

title: The Coast Guard is sending a warning with this video
description: The US Coast Guard has released a video of a spinning boat in Miami as a reminder that some vessels are required to have wearable engine kill switches.

title: The UAE is partnering with Japanese company iSpace to launch a moon rover in 2022
description: Japanese lunar robotics company iSpace will deliver a rover built by the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to the moon in 2022, it announced Wednesday.

title: Coinbase says it's the bitcoin investment for people afraid of buying bitcoin
description: Coinbase Global is going public through a direct listing Wednesday, becoming the first cryptocurrency exchange on the stock market.

title: Security camera captures meteor in Florida
description: A meteor was seen bursting through the sky in Florida and spotted as far as the Bahamas.

title: Hit crime drama 'Luther' isn't 'authentic,' BBC's diversity chief says
description: The BBC's diversity chief has said its hit detective series "Luther" is not "authentic" enough.

title: Interactions between early modern humans and Neanderthals were a lot more common than we thought
description: The Neanderthal DNA in East Asians today can be traced back to interactions between Neanderthals and early modern humans in Europe 45,000 years ago.

title: These unlikely events are still more likely than a blood clot after the J&J vaccine
description: CNN's John Avlon puts into perspective the likelihood of suffering from rare blood clots that have been reported in only six of the 6.8 million Johnson & Johnson Covid-19 vaccine recipients in the US.

title: What Black drivers are doing to protect themselves during traffic stops
description: When Laura Coates' husband brought a dash camera home a few years ago, she rolled her eyes. There he goes buying yet another gadget, she remembers thinking.

title: French winemakers face devastation after worst weather in 30 years
description: One of France's biggest export industries is facing a devastating blow after an unusually severe frost earlier this month damaged vineyards across the country, heaping pain on winemakers already reeling from the pandemic and US tariffs.

title: Morgan Wallen says he's working on himself after racial slur controversy
description: After apologizing in February for a racial slur controversy, Morgan Wallen isn't planning on riding the success of his recent album.

title: Las Vegas is set to come out of Covid-19 better than ever
description: More than a year into the Covid-19 pandemic, this desert city is looking bigger, bolder and better than ever.

title: Justin Bieber's drug problem was so bad that bodyguards would check his pulse as he slept
description: Justin Bieber has opened up about his transformation from wild child to reformed character.

title: Dr. Fauci on Tucker Carlson's comment: Typical crazy conspiracy theory
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci responds to Fox News host Tucker Carlson after Carlson suggested Covid-19 vaccines are not effective.

title: Aeropostale: The hero pilots who connected the world by airmail
description: What do two major national airlines, an American fashion retail brand, a large publicly listed industrial corporation, a Hollywood movie and several prize-winning literary works all have in common?

title: W. Galen Weston, billionaire and 'retail visionary,' is dead at 80
description: W. Galen Weston, the patriarch of a retail and food empire that spans the Atlantic, has died at 80.

title: USA predicted to top Tokyo Olympics medal table
description: The circumstances around this year's Olympics might be wildly different compared to previous Games, but history could be about to repeat itself when it comes to the Tokyo 2020 medal table.

title: China is going after tech companies. Tesla is trying to keep out of the way
description: Tesla is still trying to get back on China's good side.

title: UN rights chief fears Myanmar heading to 'full blown conflict'
description: The United Nations high commissioner for human rights, Michelle Bachelet, has warned Myanmar is heading toward a "full blown conflict" with "clear echoes" of Syria in 2011, unless the international community steps in to stop the violence.

title: Biden dispatches unofficial delegation to Taiwan
description: President Joe Biden dispatched an unofficial delegation to Taiwan Tuesday in a show of support for the island, according to a senior administration official and a State Department spokesperson.

title: Use-of-force expert says Chauvin's actions were 'justified'
description: Barry Brodd, a former police officer and use-of-force expert for the defense, testified that Derek Chauvin's actions were "justified" and that it was not a use of deadly force.
